Question & Options:
Which of the following statements are true regarding the characters in the movie 'Halla Bol'?
Options:
A. Ajay Devgn plays the character of Ashfaque.
B. Ashfaque eventually becomes a superstar known as Sameer Khan.
C. Sameer Khan is a character played by Ajay Devgn.
D. All of the above
Correct Answer: Ajay Devgn plays the character of Ashfaque and Ashfaque eventually becomes a superstar known as Sameer Khan.

A. Sameer Khan
B. Corruption

What can be said about Ajay Devgn's character in the movie *Halla Bol*?
Options:

What challenges did Ashfaque face after becoming Sameer Khan in his film career?
Options:
A. He gained immense popularity as Sameer Khan.
B. He struggled with his identity due to his roles.
C. He maintained strong relationships with his loved ones.
D. He became involved in corruption.
Correct Answer: He struggled with his identity due to his roles. He became involved in corruption.
